translations.settings.local_cache.title: Lokinyake Lo Wach
translations.settings.local_cache.description: Kiwoti kekakini wokowo i kilipet. Ekeng tekare echab lokokoye enyom iya amangana ilipet lo wach koni kitap ka kon. Lokokoyo kamakonyo kwa kilokoko nyai lo nginika ka nga lyeny.
translations.home.title: Guta
translations.explore.title: Peendina
translations.notification.login.title: Mukuphonya!
translations.notification.offline.title: Muli pa intaneti.
translations.notification.offline.message: Mutha kugwiritsa ntchito pulogalamu ndikufufuza zomwe zili pa intaneti, koma zinthu zina (monga mavidiyo) zimatha kukhala zosas Available.
translations.notification.privacy_policy.title: Polisi ya Privacy
translations.notification.privacy_policy.message: Dinani apa kuti mukhale ndi mvomero pa polisi yathu ya privacy kuti mupindule ndi ntchito zonse za pulogalamu.
